briefTitle: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of TQB2440 Injection/Perjeta® Combined With Trastuzumab and Docetaxel in the Treatment of Patients With Early or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer.
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-controlled Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of TQB2440 Injection/Perjeta ® Combined With Trastuzumab and Docetaxel in Patients With Early or Locally Advanced ER/ PR-negative HER2-positive Breast Cancer.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Overall pathological complete response (tpCR) rate assessed by Independent review committee (IRC).
